strings.affinity: You never left me out, even though I'm so gloomy. That makes me...happy.
strings.description: A young girl who began studying magic in order to overcome her shyness. However, as she evolved into a black mage with powers surpassing even her master's, she found it only more difficult to relate to others. As a result, she is overzealous in combat, that she might prove herself worthy to her companions on the battlefield.
strings.fusion:
You made me stronger.
Now I'll try even harder on the battlefield!
strings.summon:
Uhhh... All I'm good at is magic.
But if it helps you, I'm happy!

strings.description: A young girl who began studying magic as a means to overcome her introverted nature. Ironically, she was only further alienated from others as her skills with black magic blossomed. Though compassionate at her core, she is ruthless in combat, determined to prove the value of what she paid for with loneliness.
strings.fusion: D-do you think I can be of any use now?
strings.summon:
Uhhh... Well...
If you don't mind having me, I'll join your side.
